Friends

class MGColors

Detailed Description

MGColor defines the GL color.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum MGColor::ColorID

Color enumuration.

This is completely compatible to GDI+ color enumuration. The color id from 1 to 8(black to white) is the id of IGES.

enum MGColor::ColorID

Color enumuration.

This is completely compatible to GDI+ color enumuration. The color id from 1 to 8(black to white) is the id of IGES.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MGColor::MGColor ( unsigned int  argb  ) 

Construct a color from ARGB value.

In argb, each 8bits of (a,r,g,b) is the value of the range 0 to 255 .

MGColor::MGColor ( unsigned int  argb  )  [inline]

Construct a color from ARGB value.

In argb, each 8bits of (a,r,g,b) is the value of the range 0 to 255 .

Member Function Documentation

void MGColor::drawAttrib ( bool  no_color = false  )  const [virtual]

draw GLAttribute process.

Parameters:
no_color if true, color attribute will be neglected.

Implements MGGLAttrib.

void MGColor::drawAttrib ( bool  no_color = false  )  const [inline, virtual]

draw GLAttribute process.

Parameters:
no_color if true, color attribute will be neglected.

Implements MGGLAttrib.

static size_t MGColor::get_ARGBinstance ( MGColor::ColorID  id  )  [inline, static]

Get unsigned integer valur of a color id.

Function's return value is (A, R, G, B) data of GDI+.

static size_t MGColor::get_ARGBinstance ( MGColor::ColorID  id  )  [static]

Get unsigned integer valur of a color id.

Function's return value is (A, R, G, B) data of GDI+.

int MGColor::get_ColorID ( int  maxID  )  const [inline]

get the color id of GDI+ color enumeration.

If not found, 0 will be returned. maxID is the max id of ColorID enumeration.

int MGColor::get_ColorID ( int  maxID  )  const

get the color id of GDI+ color enumeration.

If not found, 0 will be returned. maxID is the max id of ColorID enumeration.

MGColor& MGColor::operator*= ( float  scale  )  [inline]

Scaling the color values by the factor scale.

All of the elements except trancparency element will be multiplied by the scale and be clamped between 0. and 1.

MGColor& MGColor::operator*= ( float  scale  ) 

Scaling the color values by the factor scale.

All of the elements except trancparency element will be multiplied by the scale and be clamped between 0. and 1.

MGColor& MGColor::operator+= ( float  value  )  [inline]

Add a color values to RGB data.

All of the elements except trancparency element will be added by value and be clamped between 0. and 1.

MGColor& MGColor::operator+= ( float  value  ) 

Add a color values to RGB data.

All of the elements except trancparency element will be added by value and be clamped between 0. and 1.

int MGColor::out_to_IGES ( MGIgesOfstream &  igesfile,
int  SubordinateEntitySwitch = 0 
) const [virtual]

Output to IGES stream file(Color=PD314).

Function's return value is the directory entry id created.

Reimplemented from MGGel.

int MGColor::out_to_IGES ( MGIgesOfstream &  igesfile,
int  SubordinateEntitySwitch = 0 
) const [virtual]

Output to IGES stream file(Color=PD314).

Function's return value is the directory entry id created.
